languages.text: Спасти ксеносов невозможно — но можно обезопасить эту систему. Вольный Торговец приказывает подорвать минное поле вместе с кораблем эльдаров.
Saving the xenos is impossible, but at least the system can be made safe for travel. The Rogue Trader orders the minefield detonated, taking with it the Aeldari voidship.
languages.original_text: Спасти ксеносов невозможно — но можно обезопасить эту систему. Вольный Торговец приказывает подорвать минное поле вместе с кораблем эльдаров.

traits.locale_text: Saving the xenos is impossible, but at least the system can be made safe for travel. The Rogue Trader orders the minefield detonated, taking with it the Aeldari voidship.
Saving the xenos is impossible, but at least the system can be made safe for travel. The Rogue Trader orders the minefield detonated, taking with it the Aeldari voidship.
Saving the xenos is impossible, but at least the system can be made safe for travel. The Rogue Trader orders the minefield detonated, taking with it the Aeldari voidship.
Saving the xenos is impossible, but at least the system can be made safe for travel. The Rogue Trader orders the minefield detonated, taking with it the Aeldari voidship.
Saving the xenos is impossible, but at least the system can be made safe for travel. The Rogue Trader orders the minefield detonated, taking with it the Aeldari voidship.

languages.text: 那些异形已经没救了，但至少这个星系的危险可以排除，保障航道的安全。行商浪人下令引爆雷区，连同艾达灵族的虚空舰一起摧毁。
languages.original_text: Saving the xenos is impossible, but at least the system can be made safe for travel. The Rogue Trader orders the minefield detonated, taking with it the Aeldari voidship.

traits.locale_text: 那些异形已经没救了，但至少这个星系的危险可以排除，保障航道的安全。行商浪人下令引爆雷区，连同艾达灵族的虚空舰一起摧毁。

languages.text: 異種族を救うことは不可能だが、少なくとも星系を安全に移動させることはできる。ローグトレーダーは機雷原を爆発させ、アエルダリのヴォイドシップを破壊するよう命じる。
languages.original_text: Saving the xenos is impossible, but at least the system can be made safe for travel. The Rogue Trader orders the minefield detonated, taking with it the Aeldari voidship.

traits.locale_text: 異種族を救うことは不可能だが、少なくとも星系を安全に移動させることはできる。ローグトレーダーは機雷原を爆発させ、アエルダリのヴォイドシップを破壊するよう命じる。

languages.text: Salvar a los xenos es imposible, pero al menos el sistema puede ser seguro para viajar. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ordena detonar el campo de minas, llevándose consigo la nave del vacío Aeldari.
languages.original_text: Saving the xenos is impossible, but at least the system can be made safe for travel. The Rogue Trader orders the minefield detonated, taking with it the Aeldari voidship.

traits.locale_text: Salvar a los xenos es imposible, pero al menos el sistema puede ser seguro para viajar. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ordena detonar el campo de minas, llevándose consigo la nave del vacío Aeldari.

languages.text: Es ist unmöglich, die Xenos zu retten, aber man kann zumindest dafür sorgen, dass das System ungefährdet bereist werden kann. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} befiehlt, das Minenfeld zu sprengen – und mit ihm auch das Aeldari-Raumschiff.
languages.original_text: Saving the xenos is impossible, but at least the system can be made safe for travel. The Rogue Trader orders the minefield detonated, taking with it the Aeldari voidship.

traits.locale_text: Es ist unmöglich, die Xenos zu retten, aber man kann zumindest dafür sorgen, dass das System ungefährdet bereist werden kann. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} befiehlt, das Minenfeld zu springen — und mit ihm auch das Aeldari-Raumschiff.

languages.text: Si les xénos sont condamnés, cela n'empêche pas de sécuriser les voies navigables du système. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} donne l'ordre de faire exploser le champ de mines, quitte à sacrifier au passage le vaisseau aeldari.
languages.original_text: Saving the xenos is impossible, but at least the system can be made safe for travel. The Rogue Trader orders the minefield detonated, taking with it the Aeldari voidship.

traits.locale_text: Si les xénos sont condamnés, cela n'empêche pas de sécuriser les voies navigables du système. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} donne l'ordre de faire exploser le champ de mines, quitte à sacrifier au passage le vaisseau aeldari.

languages.text: Zenoları kurtarmanın yolu yok ama en azından bu sistem güvenle seyahat edilebilir bir hâle getirilebilir. Hür Tacir, Aeldari uçsuz gemisiyle birlikte mayın tarlasının patlatılmasını emrediyor.
languages.original_text: Saving the xenos is impossible, but at least the system can be made safe for travel. The Rogue Trader orders the minefield detonated, taking with it the Aeldari voidship.
